message.abstract: Intrinsically doped YCuxTe2 samples exhibit very low thermal conductivity (∼0.5 W m−1 K−1) with high zT ∼0.75 at 780 K.
title: AAAAAA Ipsum YCuTe2: a member of a new class of thermoelectric materials with CuTe4-based layered structure
